- [ ] Mock MWA Wallet

Before submitting an issue, you must test with at least Mock MWA Wallet + 1 other wallet.

2. Go to '...'
3. Click on '....'
4. Scroll down to '....'
5. See error

- A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.
